title: Project ZETA Playtest Steam Key Giveaway
description: KRAFTON and GamerPower have teamed up to give players access to Project ZETA’s Closed Beta Test #3! CBT3 features 2 new heroes, reworks for existing ones, overhauled visuals, and simplified Prism scoring rules for quicker, more exciting matches! CBT3 begins on December 12th and runs for 2 weekends (Dec 12th-14th and Dec 19th-21st). For more information on the schedule, the game, and what’s new, head over to the official Project ZETA Website and Discord channel. About: Storm the Aran Plateau with one of 13 unique Heroes as 5 teams of 3 battle it out to be the winner in this action-packed, 3rd person MOBA! CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE All gameplay remains under strict NDA protection. Streaming, recording, or publicly sharing any footage or content is prohibited and may result in immediate removal from the beta test and future blacklisting of other products. Private feedback channels will be provided for approved testers via Discord after agreeing to the NDA through the game client.
instructions: 1. Create or log in to your free GamerPower account. 2. Click the button to unlock your key. 3. Launch the Steam client software and log into your Steam account. 4. Click the Games Menu. Choose Activate a Product on Steam. 5. Follow the onscreen instructions to complete the process.

title: DungeonLoot: Open Beta Has Arrived!
description: The GamerPower team is on a quest to bring more loot to gamers, so we created DungeonLoot. The idea is something like Amazon Prime Gaming, but completely free. No subscriptions or costs, just a place where you can claim gaming loot anytime. Our goal? To make DungeonLoot the ultimate place for gaming giveaways.
instructions: 1. Click the button to visit DungeonLoot. 2. Simply create an account. 3. Select your favorite giveaway and grab the loot. It's that easy!
platforms: PC, Steam, Epic Games Store, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, Android, iOS
